articles.title: Plenary Meeting of C.C., WPK to Be Convened
articles.content:
Plenary Meeting of C.C., WPK to Be Convened
Pyongyang, March 27 (KCNA) -- The Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) on Tuesday released a decision on convening a plenary meeting of the C.C., WPK. 
					The decision says that now the party members, service personnel and all other people have turned out in the just struggle against the U.S. and efforts for building a socialist economic power with a great honor and pride of having the dear respected Kim Jong Un at the head of the WPK and the revolution and with confidence of the final victory. 
					
					It goes on:
					
					Today we have a sacred task to closely unite around Kim Jong Un in single mind, display the might of the great Paektusan nation all over the world, defend the dignity of the nation and sovereignty of the country and build a thriving socialist nation, thus accomplishing the Juche revolutionary cause started in Mt. Paektu. 
					
					The Political Bureau of the WPK Central Committee decides to convene its plenary meeting in late March of Juche 102 (2013) to discuss and decide an important issue for victoriously advancing the Korean revolution and make a drastic turn in accomplishing the Juche revolutionary cause under the banner of the great Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism.

articles.title: Telephone Message Sent to S. Korean Military Authorities
articles.content:
Telephone Message Sent to S. Korean Military Authorities
Pyongyang, ï¼­arch 27 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet forces have kicked up the racket for confrontation with the fellow countrymen by taking the advantages of the U.S. intensified nuclear threats to the DPRK and the racket for sanctions on it. They have now entered the phase of hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK.
					The Supreme Command of the Korean People's Army solemnly declared that it would demonstrate the firm will for counteraction of the army and people with substantial military actions to defend the sovereignty and the supreme dignity of the country under the prevailing situation where the U.S., the south Korean puppet forces and all other followers have entered an adventurous phase in their hostile acts against the DPRK after going beyond the phase of threatening and blackmailing.
					
					Due to the reckless acts of the enemies, the north-south military communications which were set up for dialogue and cooperation between the north and the south has already lost its significance.
					
					In this regard, the head of the DPRK side's delegation to the north-south general-level military talks sent the south Korean puppet military authorities the following telephone message at 11:20 on Wednesday:
					
					The situation is becoming grim as the south side staged the Key Resolve and Foal Eagle nuclear war exercises pursuant to the U.S. moves to encroach upon the sovereignty of the DPRK.
					
					Under the situation where a war may break out any moment, there is no need to keep north-south military communications which were laid between the militaries of both sides.
					
					War and confrontation can never go together with dialogue and reconciliation under any circumstances.
					
					I, upon authorization, inform the south side that the north-south military communications will be cut off and the members of the north side at the military communications liaison office in the zone under the control of the north and the south in the west coastal area will stop their activities from this moment.
					
					This step will be thoroughly implemented as long as the south side's anachronistic hostile acts against the DPRK go on.
					
					There do not exist any dialogue channel and communications means between the DPRK and the U.S. and between the north and the south.
					
					Not words but only arms will work on the U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces.
					
					The will of the army and people of the DPRK to safeguard the sovereignty and the supreme dignity of the country will be displayed through practical physical counteraction.

articles.title: DPRK Premier Visits Jangjae, Mu Islets Defence Detachments
articles.content:
DPRK Premier Visits Jangjae, Mu Islets Defence Detachments
Pyongyang, March 27 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Choe Yong Rim toured Jangjae Islet Defence Detachment and Mu Islet Hero Defence Detachment.
					Going round the detachments, he stressed that there is nothing to be afraid of even though tens of millions of enemies come in attack as long as there is the dear respected Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un in the van of the revolution. He noted that no one can escape the strike by the powerful revolutionary Paektusan army to mercilessly sweep away the hotbed of evils if the enemies continue the reckless saber-rattling.
					
					The army and people of the DPRK have now turned out as one in the all-out action with the U.S. imperialists because the sovereignty of the nation is more valuable than their own lives, he said, calling for devotedly defending the Supreme Commander with arms.
					
					Going round bedrooms, wash-cum-bath houses and other places, he learned about problems urgently essential for improving the material and cultured lives of the soldiers as well as those issues arising in turning the detachments into impregnable fortresses, and pressed for necessary measures.

articles.title: President of Equatorial Guinea Congratulates DPRK on Its Demonstration of National Power
articles.content:
President of Equatorial Guinea Congratulates DPRK on Its Demonstration of National Power
Pyongyang, March 27 (KCNA) -- Obiang Nguema Mbasogo, president of the Republic of Equatorial Guinea, had a talk with the DPRK Foreign Ministry delegation led by Vice-Minister Kim Hyong Jun at the presidential palace on Monday when it was staying in the country.
					He recalled that the Korean people heroically fought against the Japanese and U.S. imperialists under the leadership of President Kim Il Sung, firmly defending the sovereignty of the country.
					
					He congratulated the DPRK on having recently demonstrated its national power with high technology after emerging a power with strong military capability.
					
					He hoped that the DPRK government and people would register greater success under the wise leadership of the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un in future.
					
					He expressed his will to steadily expand the favorably developing relations of friendship and cooperation with the DPRK in various fields.

articles.title: German VIP Visits Mangyongdae
articles.content:
German VIP Visits Mangyongdae
Pyongyang, March 27 (KCNA) -- Manfred Grund, secretary general of the Christian Democratic Union-Christian Social Union Joint Group at the German Federal Parliament, visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung, on Wednesday.
					The guest went round the historic relics preserved at the President's old home in Mangyongdae, being briefed on his revolutionary history and the patriotic lives of his family members in Mangyongdae.
					
					He toured the Tower of the Juche Idea, the National Gifts Exhibition House, the People's Open-air Ice Rink, etc.

articles.title: S. Korean Chief Executive's Invectives against DPRK Slammed: CPRK Spokesman
articles.content:
S. Korean Chief Executive's Invectives against DPRK Slammed: CPRK Spokesman
Pyongyang, March 27 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea (CPRK) gave the following answer to a question put by KCNA Wednesday in connection with the fact that the present chief executive of south Korea made invectives slandering the DPRK:
					The chief of Chongwadae made a "memorial address" at a "service" held at Taejon Memorial Monument Tuesday amid the anti-DPRK confrontation racket that has been stepped up in south Korea on the occasion of the third anniversary of Cheonan warship sinking case.
					
					In the address she let loose a string of confrontational rhetoric that "nuclear weapons can not protect the social system", "nuclear weapons should be dismantled" and called for "change" and "stop to provocation."
					
					She even said invectives slandering the social system in the DPRK, talking about "hunger", "isolation" and "option of road for peace and prosperity".
					
					This is an unpardonable provocation against the DPRK and a blatant challenge to it.
					
					As for the sinking case, it was a hideous farce orchestrated by the group of Lee Myung Bak as part of its moves for confrontation and a war against the DPRK. The truth of the case has already been brought to light, inviting derision of the public at home and abroad.
					
					No other country is wicked and degenerated more than the group of traitors of south Korea who hurled innocent young people of the puppet army into miserable death and is using it for escalating confrontation with fellow countrymen.
					
					Matter is that the owner of the inner room of Chongwadae is repeating the confrontation racket of the preceding regime. What's more, she said "it is impossible to live with nukes", just echoing what her precedent said. This is utterly shocking when recalling "distinction" and "switchover in north policy" much touted by her.
					
					This clearly shows that the present regime is confrontation-minded regime little different from the Lee Myung Bak regime.
					
					Is it the north's nukes or the U.S. nukes which threaten the security and peace? Who is keen on provocation and who should be changed?
					
					The owner of Chongwadae had better know this and watch her tongue.
					
					She did not hesitate to make venomous remarks at the "presidential inaugural speech" and "speech for commemorating March first uprising". This time her remarks have gone beyond the line.
					
					"Process for building trust" and "dialogue" are just hypocrisy and deception as she now incites confrontation with fellow countrymen.
					
					We have already seriously warned against the venomous swish of skirt of Chongwadae.
					
					We are now again forced to warn south Korea that the ever-more undisguised confrontation frenzy is pushing the DPRK's patience and self-restraint to the limit.
					
					She should behave with discretion, clearly mindful that a wrong word may entail horrible disaster at a time when the north-south relations are being pushed to the lowest ebb and the danger of an all-out war is increasing on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					If she keeps to the road of confrontation like traitor Lee, defying the warnings of the DPRK, she will meet a miserable ruin.

articles.title: Kim Kwan Jin's Stay in Office Denounced by CPRK Secretariat
articles.content:
Kim Kwan Jin's Stay in Office Denounced by CPRK Secretariat
Pyongyang, March 27 (KCNA) -- The Secretariat of the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea (CPRK) released the following information bulletin No. 1026 Wednesday: 
					Kim Kwan Jin, die-hard confrontation manic, was made to stay in office as defense minister of the new puppet regime in south Korea.
					
					He is a typical pro-U.S. confrontation element who cried out for "retaliatory punishment" and "strike on provocation bases" after becoming minister of Defense in December 2010 right after the puppet warmongers on Yonphyong Island were hit back by the DPRK.
					
					Soon after his stay in office was confirmed, Kim Kwan Jin made a provocative bluster that "insecurity is mounting" and "misjudgment is possible", even hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK. On March 25 he visited the 6th brigade of the marine corps on Paekryong Island where he let loose such bluff that "when the north makes another provocation, it should be harshly punished" and "base of provocation and even supporting forces and commanding forces must be attacked".
					
					The stay in office by Kim, who earned an ill fame as a wicked confrontation maniac for going reckless like a starving wolf, clearly revealed the intention of the present regime to escalate an all-out confrontation with the DPRK just like the preceding Lee Myung Bak regime did.
					
					His stay in office proves that the "building of trust" and "dialogue" much touted by the owner of the inner room of Chongwadae were nothing but a deceptive play upon words.
					
					The owner of Chongwadae let Kim Kwan Jin who served the Lee regime hold the post of the puppet Minister of Defense. This is aimed to put under control the sentiment of "insecurity" pervading south Korea and counter the DPRK's toughest stand.
					
					It is a serious miscalculation to think of standing in confrontation with the DPRK while stepping up a war frenzy by putting forward such war maniacs as Kim.
					
					This, however, will entail self-destruction.
					
					Traitor Lee faced a miserable fate because he had been intent on confrontation with fellow countrymen by instigating such wicked pro-U.S. confrontation maniacs as Kim Kwan Jin and Hyon In Thaek.
					
					The present south Korean regime will face the same fate as traitor Lee if it keeps to the road of confrontation with the DPRK by inveigling such warmonger as Kim, far from drawing a lesson from the miserable end of the predecessor.
					
					We have already sentenced Kim Kwan Jin to a death penalty in the name of the nation after branding him as a top class war criminal. 
					
					A mad wolf has to be beaten to death.
					
					Kim Kwan Jin will perish in the flames kindled by himself.
					
					The owner of Chongwadae will be made to pay a dear price for letting such a hideous confrontation maniac as Kim stay in office.

articles.title: We Will Remove Anderson Air Base from Earth: KPA Officers
articles.content:
We Will Remove Anderson Air Base from Earth: KPA Officers

articles.title: National Symposium on Medical Science Held
articles.content:
National Symposium on Medical Science Held
Pyongyang, March 27 (KCNA) -- A national symposium on medical science took place here on Tuesday and Wednesday to mark the 45th anniversary of President Kim Il Sung's work "On Combating Epidemics More Effectively".
					The work, published on Mar. 26, Juche 57(1968), comprehensively clarifies the issues arising in combating epidemics more effectively.
					
					More than 180 scientific papers were presented to the symposium. 
					
					Present there were officials concerned, medical workers, scientists, technicians and teachers in the field of public health.
					
					Kim Hyong Hun, chairman of the Central Committee of the Medical Association of Korea, in his address at the symposium referred to the fact that great successes have been achieved in the work for preventing and eradicating diseases including epidemics and consolidating the advantages of the socialist public health system under the wise leadership of the peerlessly great persons. 
					
					Then papers on successes made in scientific researches were presented there.
					
					The papers drew attention of the participants for their great practical significance.

articles.title: Spring Tree Planting Brisk in DPRK
articles.content:
Spring Tree Planting Brisk in DPRK
Pyongyang, March 27 (KCNA) -- Spring tree planting is progressing apace in the DPRK.
					South Hwanghae Province set the goal to plant tens of millions of trees this spring and is registering successes.
					
					Jaeryong and Jangyon counties proved successful in producing saplings and digging out holes, while planting lots of trees every day.
					
					Unryul and Sinchon counties succeeded in digging lots of holes in last autumn through a mass movement. They are planting trees as required by technological norms to raise the rate of rooting.
					
					Officials and other people and schoolchildren in North Hwanghae Province are also registering successes in tree planting.
					
					Kumchon County planted at least 160,000 trees in recent three days.
					
					Sohung and Singye counties are also overfulfiling their daily plans for tree planting.
					
					Signal successes in tree planting were reported from North Phyongan Province. People in Cholsan County planted lots of trees on either side of major roads extending tens of kilometers and nearby mountains. They created tens of hectares of forests of pine-nut, larch and three-leaves pine trees.
					
					People in Kangwon Province are also planting trees of good species.

articles.title: Scientific Inquiry Prize Awarded to Exemplary University Students
articles.content:
Scientific Inquiry Prize Awarded to Exemplary University Students
Pyongyang, March 27 (KCNA) -- Certificates and medals of the scientific inquiry prize for university students were awarded to exemplary university students in recognition of their contributions to solving technological issues arising in various fields of national economy through a brisk movement for scientific inquiry. 
					An awarding ceremony was held at the Hall of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League on Wednesday.

articles.title: Sports Tournament under Way in Pyongyang
articles.content:
Sports Tournament under Way in Pyongyang
Pyongyang, March 27 (KCNA) -- With sports enthusiasm mounting in across the country, a tournament of officials of city-level institutions is going on here as part of the 16th Mangyongdae Prize Sports Contest held annually on the occasion of the Day of the Sun (April 15), the birthday of President Kim Il Sung.
					Taking part in the tournament, launched on March 20, are more than 3,000 men and women.
					
					With 10 events, including football, basketball, volleyball and defence sports, it is held on a knockout basis, divided into three groups.
					
					What drew attention of spectators in the tournament is the Taekwon-Do event, in which the Central Information and Communications Centre, Pyongyang Secondary School No. 1 and the Pyongyang Automation Instrument Factory have proved successful in team and individual patterns. Table-tennis competitions, too, catch eyes of spectators.
					
					The tournament will run until April 13.

articles.title: Koreans Ready to Show Their Mettle to U.S., Other Hostile Forces
articles.content:
Koreans Ready to Show Their Mettle to U.S., Other Hostile Forces
Pyongyang, March 27 (KCNA) -- The hearts of all service personnel and people of the DPRK are burning with hatred for the enemies and will to wipe them out, upon hearing the statement of the Supreme Command of the Korean People's Army in which it clarified its strong resolution to take practical military actions in retaliation against the hostile forces which dared harm the sovereignty and dignity of the supreme leadership of the country.
					KPA officer Cha Ok Chol, 37, told KCNA:
					
					How can we pardon the Yankees who hatched even a sinister plot to defame the supreme dignity, which we regard dearer than our own lives, not content with staging madcap nuclear war drills?
					
					This means the height of blatant provocations as they put all the hostile acts perpetrated by them against the DPRK so far into the shade. This hardens the retaliatory will of the service personnel of my unit tasked to strike one of the military bases of the U.S. imperialist aggressor troops in the operational zone in the Pacific.
					
					All my service personnel keeping themselves on the highest alert will give play to their will and capability to wipe out the enemies once Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un issues an order and reduce the U.S., cesspit of vices, to ashes at a single blow.
					
					Yu Yong Sun, 20, girl student of Kim Il Sung University, said:
					
					Whoever allows the supreme dignity of the Korean nation to be hurt and threatened cannot claim to be a Korean.
					
					The hearts of my fellow students are burning with the will to become human A-bombs and fly to the positions of the Yankees and blow them up.
					
					We have all modern high precision nuclear strike means in place. We have something more powerful than them -- that is the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un, great Songun commander, and the single-minded unity of the army and people rallied around him.
					
					We will replace our pens by arms for taking revenge upon the enemies once the Supreme Commander gives us an order.
					
					We should teach a lesson to the upbeat Yankees who put Iraq and Afghanistan under their control.
					
					The Yankees will surely meet a miserable end for hatching a sinister plot to hurt the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK.

articles.title: Koreans Vow to Push Traitors Who Hurt Dignity of DPRK Supreme Leadership to Ditch
articles.content:
Koreans Vow to Push Traitors Who Hurt Dignity of DPRK Supreme Leadership to Ditch
Pyongyang, March 27 (KCNA) -- The army and people of the DPRK are shuddering with anger at the hideous criminal acts of the south Korean puppet group of traitors who dare hurt the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK.

					The acts of slandering the dignity of the supreme leadership of the nation is a serious act of treachery that can be committed only by traitors steeped in the concept of confrontation with fellow countrymen to the marrow of their bones.

					Those hooligans who are in disregard of history and nation must be put to death by dismemberment.

					There is no space on earth where the thrice-cursed traitors can shelter as long as they slandered the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK.
					
					The army and people of the DPRK are waiting for an order to mount thousand-fold retaliatory blows at the enemies.
					
					Pak pledged to rush to the south and take revenge on them once an order is given.
					
					He vowed to mercilessly wipe out the group of traitors and its stooges wherever they might be on earth.
					
					He will punish the war maniacs and immoral persons so that they can not find the ground for burial even after their death, he stressed.

articles.title: DPRK People Vow Revenge on S. Korean Military
articles.content:
DPRK People Vow Revenge on S. Korean Military
Pyongyang, March 27 (KCNA) -- The recently disclosed scheme of the south Korean military to hurt the dignity of the supreme leadership of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea has lashed its people into fury.

articles.title: DPRK Servicepersons Vow to Destroy All Bases of Provokers
articles.content:
DPRK Servicepersons Vow to Destroy All Bases of Provokers
Pyongyang, March 27 (KCNA) -- The U.S. imperialist aggressor troops are intensifying war maneuvers for a nuclear war against the DPRK with mobilization of what they call "three nuclear attack means". articles.title: Barbarians in Modern World Should Know What Real War Is Like: War Veteran
articles.content:
Barbarians in Modern World Should Know What Real War Is Like: War Veteran
Pyongyang, March 27 (KCNA) -- The service personnel and people of the DPRK are gripped by towering resentment, enraged by the provocations of the U.S. scoundrels and the south Korean puppets aimed to infringe upon the sovereignty of the DPRK and dignity of its supreme leadership.

articles.title: Pyongyangites Urge Finish to Showdown with U.S.

articles.title: Spring Costume Suitable to Koreans
articles.content:
Spring Costume Suitable to Koreans
Pyongyang, March 27 (KCNA) -- A change has taken place in the Korean people's costume with the advent of spring season.
					Seen in streets of Pyongyang are women dressed in chima (skirt) and jogori (coat), an elegantly and beautifully looking traditional costume.
					
					In this regard, KCNA met Pak Hyon Sik, director of the Clothing Institute under the Ministry of Foodstuff and Daily Necessities Industry.
					
					Pak said:
					
					People choose to wear in spring clothes convenient for movement, with their colors light bright and soft.
					
					Anyhow, mode of spring costume should be taken to suit one's countenance and figure and one's age.
					
					It is advisable for the people in the 20s or 30s to dress themselves freshly and vividly and the middle-aged to wear light-colored clothes. Chima and jogori is suitable to most of Korean women. The old persons' attire should be neat and comfortable.
					
					My institute works hard to develop colorful clothes of various fashions conforming to the socialist way of life and sentiments of the Koreans.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Warns U.S., S. Korea against Politically-motivated Terrorism against DPRK
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Warns U.S., S. Korea against Politically-motivated Terrorism against DPRK
Pyongyang, March 27 (KCNA) -- The hideous politically-motivated terrorism of the U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces targeting the dignified social system in the DPRK is being committed in a very serious phase.
					With nuclear drills for striking the simulated targets in the depth of the DPRK being conducted as part of the Foal Eagle joint military drills, the U.S. and the puppet forces were disclosed to have worked out an operational plan for hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK by employing their strike means and methods.

					The army and people of the DPRK and all other Koreans are greatly enraged at the hideous criminal act of the U.S. and the south Korean group of traitors. They are taking it as serious after branding it as the biggest provocation that can never be allowed to go on.

					The recent hideous politically-motivated terrorism targeting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK proves that the U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces have entered the phase of practical implementation in their moves to "overturn the social system" in the DPRK.
					
					The south Korean puppet military hooligans are committing such a hideous act of insulting the dignity of the supreme leadership just like a puppy knowing no fear of a tiger. This was because there were tacit connivance and support from the U.S.
					
					Shortly ago, former commander of the U.S. forces in south Korea Walter Sharp, elaborating on policy initiatives, said that the north's provocation should be countered with powerful punishment of destroying things that it considers as precious.
					
					An official of the south Korean "government" confessed that he knew the puppet army "has worked out a proposal for attacking statues with air-to-ground and ground-to-ground missiles."
					
					By taking the advantage of the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK, the present regime of south Korea is whetting the sword for escalating confrontation with fellow countrymen just like the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors which had already been thrown into the garbage ground of history.
					
					The present grim situation where the sovereignty and the dignity of the supreme leadership of the country are being encroached upon can never be tolerated.
					
					It is clear that the only best option of the army and people of the DPRK for defending the dignity of its supreme leadership, soul and life of the nation, is the practical military action for harshly punishing the group of traitors.
					
					Top class criminals are bound to pay dear prices for their crimes. Those who dare try to do harm to the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK and bring down its social system can never be safe wherever they might be and are bound to be punished thousand-fold times in the name of the nation.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Accuses S. Korean "Intelligence Service" of Its Crimes
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Accuses S. Korean "Intelligence Service" of Its Crimes
Pyongyang, March 27 (KCNA) -- The confrontational nature of the south Korean Intelligence Service (IS) has been disclosed once again.

They cracked down on organizations and figures opposed to or critical of the projects for large four rivers and the conclusion of the "Free Trade Agreement" with the U.S., terming them "forces following the north".

					IS is a general base of the south Korean fascist dictatorial rule and the center of intrigues and confrontation with the DPRK.
					
					It is due to IS that democratic rights and freedom and all other rights of the people have been ruthlessly trampled down and pro-reunification patriots and organizations harshly suppressed in south Korea.
					
					IS is persecuting and severely punishing people and progressive forces in south Korea opposed to the pro-U.S. fascist rule of the puppet ruling quarters and their confrontation moves against national reunification, labeling them as "forces following the north".
					
					It is none other than gangsters of IS who manipulated the anti- DPRK human rights campaign and operations for scattering leaflets and alluring and abducting  DPRK's citizens and orchestrated the operations to "bring down statues", a hideous attempt to hurt the dignity of its supreme leadership.

					It is earning an ill fame as an unlimited fascist plot-breeding machine such as the erstwhile "Central Intelligence Agency".

The group is working hard to crack down on the Solidarity for Progress, the Federation of University Students in the 21st Century, etc. by linking them with the DPRK.
					
					The facts go to prove that the campaign launched by the group is a premeditated one to stamp out the progressive forces.
					
					The group's moves are a revelation of the extreme repugnancy and confrontation with fellow countrymen.
					
					IS should be disbanded at once.

articles.title: AA Nullification Is Bold Decision to Terminate State of War on Korean Peninsula: KCNA Report (3)
articles.content:
AA Nullification Is Bold Decision to Terminate State of War on Korean Peninsula: KCNA Report (3)
Pyongyang, March 27 (KCNA) -- The Korean Central News Agency (KCNA) released a report on March 24, clarifying the justice of the decision for nullifying the Korean Armistice Agreement (AA).
					The third part of the three-part report said as follows:
					
					3
					
					The decision was a bold step to eradicate the leftovers of the Cold War and achieve durable peace and stability on the Korean Peninsula and thus contribute to the human cause of peace. 
					
					AA and hostile forces' alliance for a war that have still existed decades since the confrontation between the East and West ended are the last leftovers of the Cold War on the earth.
					
					Since the ceasefire in the Korean war the U.S. has obstructed the reunification of Korea to put the region under its control and fostered contradiction and confrontation between the north and the south contrary to AA which defined a peaceful solution to the Korean issue.
					
					Since the demise of the Cold War, too, it has expanded and strengthened the military alliance in the Cold War period under the pretext of the continued state of war under AA.
					
					It developed U.S.-south Korea, U.S.-Japan alliance into a triangular military alliance and a multinational military alliance comprising Australia and others. It is now spearheading the implementation of the UN Security Council's "resolution on sanctions" in a bid to hurl more satellite states than those in the 1950 Korean war into a new Korean war.
					
					More countries are participating in blocs including a military alliance under this or that pretext, to say nothing of countries and regions hostile to the DPRK after the demise of the Cold War.
					
					On the contrary, the DPRK has neither joined any military bloc nor received any guarantee for military protection such as "nuclear umbrella".
					
					It is only the DPRK that is countering the imperialist allied forces by itself outside bloc. As a result, a serious military and dynamic imbalance has been created in the international relations surrounding the Korean Peninsula.
					
					The anti-DPRK moves of the U.S. and its allies are escalating as the days go by as evidenced by the high-handed sanctions and pressure they put on it by setting in motion a hand-raising machine inside the UN while branding the DPRK's satellite launch, the legitimate right of a sovereign state, as a "provocation". This saliently reveals the reality in which only the law of jungle prevails, to say nothing of the elementary impartiality and principle.
					
					Such imbalance cannot be removed as long as there remains AA and there is a limit to the capacity of neighboring big powers to defuse the continuing instability and tension on the Korean Peninsula. This has been fully proved by the past six-decade-long history.
					
					Nowhere in the world is such war zone as the Korean Peninsula where huge nuclear strategic forces are massively deployed and military actions including joint war maneuvers are taking place almost every day.
					
					Peace on the peninsula is linked to world peace.
					
					A new Korean war will mean a regional war and world war which will involve major states in the Asia-Pacific region and the region. World peace is unthinkable apart from peace on the peninsula.
					
					The existence of the fragile AA would not be of  any help to ensuring peace on the peninsula and in the rest of the world but create only a vicious cycle in the relations among regional countries including big powers and hinder their development. This is truth proven by history.
					
					The constant source of war exists in the Asia-Pacific, the largest center of world political, economic and military activities in the 21st century though they are aimed at peace and development. This is not in line with the basic trend of the development of the present times and not beneficial to anyone.
					
					The state of ceasefire on the peninsula should not be allowed to go on in the light of the trend of the times and the prevailing situation.
					
					The nullification of AA shows once again the iron will of the DPRK which set it as the main task for defending the sovereignty to ensure peace on the peninsula and has made every possible effort to do so.
					
					The option of the DPRK has become clear now that the moves of all hostile forces to encroach upon its sovereignty and dignity are reaching a dangerous phase.
					
					The army and people of the DPRK have launched a decisive battle for national reunification and peace of mankind, keenly aware of the noble responsibility for protecting the destiny of the country and the nation and convinced of the final victory in the all-out action against the U.S.
					
					It is their invariable stand and the mode of the counteraction of Mt. Paektu style to counter the enemy coming in attack with a knife with a sword, a rifle with artillery piece, and nukes with precision strike means more powerful than them.
					
					Gone are the days when there was verbal exchange.
					
					If the hostile forces dare provoke the DPRK, misjudging its steadfast toughest countermeasures, they will perish in face of its merciless, deadly retaliatory blows.
					
					All the service personnel and people of the DPRK will fully realize the sovereignty of the country and the nation by dint of the tremendous might of Songun they have bolstered and record a new history of great Korea which has defeated the imperialist allied forces.

articles.title: Minju Joson Assails U.S., S Korean  Dangerous War Scenario
articles.content:
Minju Joson Assails U.S., S Korean Dangerous War Scenario
Pyongyang, March 27 (KCNA) -- Commander of the south Korea-U.S. combined forces Sherman and Chairman of the south Korean puppet Joint Chiefs of Staff Jong Sung Jo signed a "plan for jointly countering the provocation of a local war " on March 22.
					Minju Joson Wednesday in a bylined commentary observes in this regard:

					The keynote of the war scenario is to unconditionally and immediately hurl U.S. forces into a war if the south Korean puppet army requests their help. The U.S. forces having the right to control wartime operations of the puppet army pretended to be "a guardian of peace," rejecting its request or employing a delaying tactics. However, the U.S. signed the above-said war scenario, revealing its true colors as crafty aggressors.
					
					The U.S. seeks to minimize its forces' loss by putting forward the south Korean puppet army as a shock force in a war against the north and thus realize its ambition to invade it.
					
					Its ulterior objective is to intervene under the pretext of "prompt assistance" in a local war to be launched by the puppet forces and go over to an all-out war against the north.
					
					As a matter of fact, the above-said war scenario took effect against the backdrop of the on-going large-scale Foal Eagle military drills against the north. Even at this hour the south Korean puppet forces are busy staging madcap war drills, crying out for "punishment" for the Cheonan warship sinking incident, the hideous farce orchestrated by themselves.
					
					This hints that Foal Eagle may develop into an actual war. The on-going north-targeted war maneuvers of the U.S. and south Korean warmongers have completely deprived the peninsula of a mechanism to deter a war. Their effectuation of this war scenario under the situation is little short of an open declaration of a war against the DPRK.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Just Great War for National Reunification
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Just Great War for National Reunification
Pyongyang, March 27 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Wednesday editorially calls upon all the service personnel and people to turn out as one in a decisive struggle for final victory to sweep the U.S. imperialists and south Korean puppet forces off the surface of the earth and achieve the historic cause of national reunification.
					The paper says:
					
					The statement of the Supreme Command of the Korean People's Army is a manifestation of the invariable will of the army and people to mercilessly wipe out the enemies who dared hurt the dignity of supreme leadership of the DPRK.
					
					The supreme dignity of the DPRK represents the prestige of the leaders and the supreme commander and serves as the life and soul of the service personnel and people in the DPRK.
					
					All the service personnel and people in Songun Korea never allow the enemies to hurt the supreme dignity. Their resentment and hatred have reached their height. It is their iron will to search for the enemies who attempted to hurt the supreme dignity even on the bed of the waters off archipelagos, beginning with Chongwadae, and tear them to pieces. 
					
					The statement meant deadly retaliatory blow at the U.S. imperialists working hard to threaten the DPRK's sovereignty and right to existence with nuclear weapons.
					
					The army and people of the DPRK will never abandon nuclear weapons in order to protect their dignity, rights, social system and cause. The U.S. imperialists brought nuclear disasters to the people in Hiroshima and Nagasaki with B-29 bombers. They are sadly mistaken if they think they can repeat this criminal history on the Korean Peninsula with B-52.
					
					The statement amounts to a stern warning to the worldwide crime of violating the conscience and peace of world and a just declaration instilling conviction of fair choice into progressive mankind.  
					
					If the U.S. imperialists ignite a nuclear war on the Korean Peninsula, it will bring a nuclear disaster not only to the Korean nation but to whole humankind.
					
					The world conscience should make a choice of justice now that the criminal nature of the UN Security Council's "resolution" has become clearer as the days go by. Justice belongs to the DPRK, not to the U.S.

articles.title: U.S., S. Korean Military Provocation Will Entail Ruin: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
U.S., S. Korean Military Provocation Will Entail Ruin: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, March 27 (KCNA) -- The U.S. and the south Korean authorities staged nuclear attack drills on simulated targets in the DPRK by activating B-52 capable of mounting nuclear warheads a few days ago.

					Being pushed to a tight corner, the U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces are trying desperately to find a way out in escalating threats of nuclear attack on the DPRK and realize their design to stifle it.

The DPRK's sophisticated nuclear deterrence that has been diversified and equipped with precision strike capabilities can thwart any nuclear attack from the U.S. and the puppet forces, reliably defend the security of the country and the nation and push the aggressors to the abyss of a final ruin.
					
					The revolutionary armed forces of the DPRK that are out in an all-out action being equipped with nuclear weapons and high precision sophisticated weapons are on the highest alert and are waiting for an order from their Supreme Commander for a war for national reunification.
					
					The warmongers should not run reckless.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Accuses Japanese Authorities of Evading Hideous Crimes against Humanity
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Accuses Japanese Authorities of Evading Hideous Crimes against Humanity
Pyongyang, March 27 (KCNA) -- The Japanese reactionaries are kicking up a noisy anti-DPRK "human rights" racket these days.

					With nothing can Japan cover up the crimes committed by the Japanese imperialists against the Korean people or write them off. 
					
					Japan should opt for settling its past, bearing this in mind.
					
					The settlement of its past crimes is not an issue that allows its shunning of their redemption. 
					
					It is a legal and moral duty it assumed before the times and history. 
					
					Japan should face up to the situation, admit the above-said crimes and take a bold action to settle its inglorious past.

articles.title: New S. Korean Defense Minister under Fire
articles.content:
New S. Korean Defense Minister under Fire
Pyongyang, March 27 (KCNA) -- Traitor Kim Kwan Jin of south Korea held a "meeting of major operational commanding officers of the whole army" some days ago upon his return from Chongwadae where he received a writ of appointment as minister of Defense.

The reckless spasm of war maniacs such as traitor Kim Kwan Jin can spark off an armed conflict at any moment and that can spill over into an all-out war in a moment.

articles.title: Former Director of "Intelligence Service" Indicted in S. Korea
articles.content:
Former Director of "Intelligence Service" Indicted in S. Korea
Pyongyang, March 27 (KCNA) -- The Teachers Trade Union of south Korea brought the case of Won Se Hun, former director of the "Intelligence Service," to the Seoul Central District Prosecutor's Office on Monday, according to south Korean KBS.
					The trade union accused him of taking the lead in the suppression of it and seriously violating law by abusing power, committing libel and interfering in the execution of duties.

articles.title: U.S. High-ranking Officials' Anti-DPRK Rhetoric Blasted
articles.content:
U.S. High-ranking Officials' Anti-DPRK Rhetoric Blasted
Pyongyang, March 27 (KCNA) -- The U.S. State secretary, Defense secretary and other high-ranking officials are raving that the DPRK is destroying peace and stability, it took a wrong option and that strong counteractions should be taken. They even said they will never recognize the DPRK as a nuclear weapons state and will never tolerate its possession of nukes.
					Commenting on this, Rodong Sinmun Wednesday says the U.S. has so far shelved the danger and gravity of nuclear threats posed by it to the DPRK and made far-fetched assertions as regards the DPRK's nuclear deterrence for coping with those threats.

					When the DPRK launched with success satellite Kwangmyongsong 3-2 for the development of science and technology and economy of the country, the U.S. groundlessly branded it as a "long-range missile launch" and instigated the UN Security Council to pass a "resolution on sanctions" against the DPRK. This clearly proves the hostility of the U.S. to the DPRK. If the U.S. behaved with discretion at that time, the situation would not have reached such a serious phase as now.
					
					The U.S. is now keeping mum about the nuclear threats it posed to the DPRK and is behaving badly only finding fault with the DPRK's access to nukes which was taken to counter the nuclear threats.
					
					Tragedy is that the U.S. still does not know about the DPRK with which it has stood in confrontation for more than half a century.
					
					It could not talk about making correct option if it had fully understood the DPRK. The DPRK regards the U.S. rhetoric as nothing but a bark made by a dog at the moon.
					
					The U.S. should clearly understand that the DPRK has its own option. It is the road of independence and Songun.

articles.title: S. Korean Organization Demands Reinvestigation into Cheonan Warship Sinking Case
articles.content:
S. Korean Organization Demands Reinvestigation into Cheonan Warship Sinking Case
Pyongyang, March 27 (KCNA) -- The Center for Peace and Disarmament of the Citizen's Solidarity for Democratic Society of south Korea released a commentary on Monday, demanding the reinvestigation into the Cheonan warship sinking case.
					The "government" and some media of south Korea made a hasty conclusion that the warship was exploded by the north but there is, in fact, no information and evidence to confirm the case, the commentary said, accusing the "government" authorities of pushing the inter-Korean relations to an unrepairable phase by taking "May 24 measure" on basis of the investigation results devoid of sufficient evidence.
					
					The commentary held that it is very essential to lift the measure for confrontation and probe again the truth behind the case through common efforts by inviting the north and neighboring countries.
					
					Underscoring the need to clear suspicions of the public at home and abroad about the warship sinking case and properly probe the truth behind the case, the commentary urged the "National Assembly" to respond to it.

articles.title: Aftermath of S. Korea-U.S. "Status of Forces Agreement"
articles.content:
Aftermath of S. Korea-U.S. "Status of Forces Agreement"
Pyongyang, March 27 (KCNA) -- Crimes by GIs present in south Korea have been reported more frequently in recent months, causing public furor.
					In March alone, they fired bullets at passers-by in front of a hotel in Rithaewon-dong, Ryongsan District of Seoul and made an assault on a citizen in Tongduchon, Kyonggi Province.
					
					Nowadays, newspapers of south Korea carry articles critical of GIs' murderous deeds, urging punishment of the criminals. They have contended that ceaseless reoccurrence of such crimes is due to the south Korea-U.S. "Status of Forces Agreement" (SOFA), which is in favor of the U.S. forces side.

					The injustice of the agreement was evidently revealed through such shocking crimes by GIs as the incidents of killing Yun Kum I and driving a U.S. armored car over two girl students.
					
					The south Korean people have realized that the U.S. forces are not "protector" of them but the root cause of all their miseries and sufferings, and are now raising their voice of demand for abrogation of the agreement.

articles.title: Chongryon Officials Vow to Turn Out in Nationwide Patriotic War
articles.content:
Chongryon Officials Vow to Turn Out in Nationwide Patriotic War
Pyongyang, March 27 (KCNA) -- Officials of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongyron) issued statements on Mar. 23 in support of "An Appeal to All Koreans" released by the Central Committee of the Democratic Front for the Reunification of Korea.
					Jo Han Ju, chairperson of the Central Standing Committee of the Union of Korean Teachers and School Clerks in Japan, declared that all officials and members of the union would turn out as one in an all-out action against the U.S. and the nationwide sacred patriotic war to defend the nation's dignity and sovereignty though they live overseas.

					Hwang Myong, chairman of the Chongryon Tokyo Metropolitan Headquarters, said that the prevailing situation calls on all Koreans in the north, the south and overseas to turn out as one in the patriotic struggle to defend the nation, irrespective of ideology and ism, class and stratum, men and women and young and old.
					
					Pak Jong Song, chairman of the Chongryon Hokkaido Headquarters, called upon all Koreans to rise up as one in an all-people resistance to protect the country's sovereignty and dignity and thus surely build a reunified and prosperous state in the land of Korea.
					
					Kim Hak Bok, chairperson of the Chongryon Kyoto Prefectural Headquarters, said that no force on earth can block the advance of the DPRK in which all the service personnel and people are single-mindedly united around their leader, carrying forward the tradition of Mt. Paektu. He urged the U.S. and its satellite forces to behave themselves, properly understanding about their rival.
					
					Pu Yong Uk, chairperson of the Chongryon Osaka Prefectural Headquarters, expressed belief that the DPRK is sure to win victory in the final anti-U.S. confrontation as there are the outstanding leadership of the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un, peerlessly brilliant  commander of Mt. Paektu,  the single-minded unity of all service personnel and people and tremendous military muscle.
					
					Ro Mu Hyon, chairman of the Chongryon Hyogo Prefectural Headquarters, said that the DPRK's all-out action is just a sacred patriotic war to put an end to the world order under the reign of all sorts of injustice, preserve justice and terminate the showdown with its sworn enemies.
					
					Mun Kwang Hui, chairperson of the Chongryon Aichi Prefectural Headquarters, said that now is the time for Koreans in Japan to closely unite as one and dynamically turn out in the patriotic struggle for defending the nation's destiny.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Celebrated in Russia
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Celebrated in Russia
Pyongyang, March 27 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee was formed in Blagobeshensk City in Amur Region, Russia to mark the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun).
					A. I. Donchenko, chairman of the Russian Blagobeshensk Association for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, was elected chairman of the committee.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Celebrated in Indonesia
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Celebrated in Indonesia
Pyongyang, March 27 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee was formed in Indonesia on March 21 to mark the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun).

articles.title: Day of Sun Celebrated Abroad
articles.content:
Day of Sun Celebrated Abroad
Pyongyang, March 27 (KCNA) -- Various events took place in different countries to mark the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun). 
					They included meetings, opening ceremonies of book, photo and handicraft exhibition, seminars, photo exhibitions and film shows in Bangladesh, Peru, Ethiopia, South Africa and Romania from Mar. 6 to 20. 
					
					On display at the venues of the events were photos of Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and the dear respected Kim Jong Un. 
					
					There were also works of the peerlessly great men, books and photos introducing Songun Korea and handicraft associated with the skills of the Korean people. 
					
					Korean films shown included "Alive in Mind of Mankind Forever" and "Fireworks for a Thriving Nation".
					
					M. Jahangir Khan, chairman of the Bangladesh Group for the Study of the Songun Policy, in his speech said that Kim Il Sung embarked on the road of revolution in his early years, opened up the new era of Juche Korea with his deep ideological and theoretical activities and revolutionary practices and performed immortal exploits in the history of struggle of mankind for liberation. 
					
					The revolutionary cause of Kim Il Sung was successfully carried forward by Kim Jong Il and it is winning victory after victory under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Un, he added. 
					
					Estuardo Martinez Perez, president of the Peruvian National Independent Movement for Free Voting's Union, said the Korean book, photo and handcraft exhibition will help the Peruvian people know well about the struggle of the Korean people advancing under the uplifted banner of Juche under the leadership of Kim Jong Un. 
					
					Medhane, secretary general of the Ethiopian Youth Study Group of the Juche Idea, explained the validity and invincible vitality of the Juche idea and the exploits Kim Il Sung performed for global independence.

articles.title: DPRK's Important Days to Be Marked in Mongolia
articles.content:
DPRK's Important Days to Be Marked in Mongolia
Pyongyang, March 27 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee was organized in Mongolia on March 20 to mark the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun) and the 60th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					L. Khaisandai, chairman of the Mongolian Mt. Paektu Association for Independent Development, was elected chairman of the committee.
					
					He said at the inaugural ceremony that eternal President of the DPRK Kim Il Sung was a great man who rendered huge service to the Korean and world revolution and an iron-willed brilliant commander who led the two revolutionary wars to victory.
					
					The committee decided to hold diverse political and cultural events to mark the anniversaries.

articles.title: Italian Organization Denounces U.S., Its Allies' Anti-DPRK Campaign
articles.content:
Italian Organization Denounces U.S., Its Allies' Anti-DPRK Campaign
Pyongyang, March 27 (KCNA) -- The Communist Youth Front of Italy on Mar. 16 made public a statement in denunciation of the U.S. and its allies' anti-DPRK campaign. 
					The statement said that these days media of the West aired distorted reports about the situation on the Korean Peninsula vociferating about the DPRK's "nuclear threat" while turning blind eyes to the U.S. imperialists' anti-DPRK campaign for aggression. 
					
					Everyone keeps mum about the U.S.-south Korea large-scale joint military exercises, the statement said, and went on:
					
					The DPRK proposed the U.S. to conclude a peace treaty long ago, but the U.S. denied it and stationed its armed forces for aggression in south Korea. 
					
					The U.S. has introduced a lot of nukes into south Korea and bolstered up arms and equipment ceaselessly. 
					
					From long ago, the DPRK has proposed denuclearizing the Korean Peninsula. However, the U.S. has sought unilateral disarmament of the DPRK only. 
					
					The DPRK's access to nuclear weapons assumes the mission of deterring a war in the face of the aggression moves of the imperialists as proved by the present situation. 
					
					We urge the U.S. to withdraw its armed forces for aggression including nukes from south Korea and conclude a peace treaty with the DPRK. 
					
					A fair international order should be established and international organizations should not be used as a tool representing the stand of the imperialists. 
					
					Media of the West should not distort the truth and describe the DPRK as a "dangerous state".

articles.title: MINREX de RPDC avisa a Consejo de Seguridad de ONU
articles.content:
MINREX de RPDC avisa a Consejo de Seguridad de ONU
Pyongyang, 27 de marzo (ACNC) -- El Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea hizo publica el dia 26 la siguiente declaracion:
					La recrudescente accion hostil de Estados Unidos, que se desarrolla so pretexto del lanzamiento de satelite con fines pacificos de la RPDC, llego por fin al borde de provocacion de guerra nuclear.
					
					El bombardero estrategico norteamericano B-52 volvio a aparecer el dia 25 en el Sur de Corea con el fin de ataque preventivo nuclear  contra la RPDC y realizo el simulacro de lanzamiento de bombas atomicas.
					
					Pese a las reiteradas advertencias de la RPDC, EE.UU. envio otra vez el bombardero estrategico, medio de provocacion de la guerra nuclear, lo cual demuestra patentemente que el designio de guerra nuclear del imperio ya entro en la etapa de ejecucion infrenable por mas tiempo.
					
					Al considerar que fracasara su politica hostil anti-RPDC, si esta con armas nucleares logra la prosperidad economica mediante la construccion de un Estado prospero, EE.UU. se desespera por buscar su salida en la provocacion de guerra nuclear anti-RPDC.
					
					A fin de preparar el pretexto internacional para la provocacion de guerra nuclear anti-RPDC bajo el rotulo de "no proliferacion de armas nucleares", el imperio invento dos veces la "resolucion de sancion" del Consejo de la Seguridad de la ONU en menos de 60 dias promoviendo el circulo vicioso de agravacion de la situacion tensa.
					
					En la actualidad, EE.UU. moviliza todos sus "tres medios de ataque nuclear" en la preparacion de guerra nuclear anti-RPDC.
					
					En el territorio principal de EE.UU. los misiles nucleares estrategicos apuntan a la RPDC y desde el Oceano Pacifico mueven los submarinos con ojivas atomicas hacia el Sur de Corea y su contorno.
					
					Por otra parte, para examinar finalmente el estado de disposicion de guerra nuclear anti-RPDC, el subsecretario de Defensa norteamericano visito el Sur de Corea, ocasion en la cual dijo abiertamente que la capa militar norteamericana pone maxima prioridad a la segunda guerra coreana y dio la orden de encender la mecha de la guerra nuclear.
					
					Segun este guion, el comandante de las tropas estadounidenses ocupantes del Sur de Corea y la autoridad de la capa militar titere surcoreana trazaron el llamado "plan de operaciones conjuntas para hacer frente a la provocacion local", cuyo contenido principal es que si el ejercito titere enciende primero el fuego, cometeria la guerra nuclear total con la movilizacion total de las tropas norteamericanas del territorio principal de EE.UU. y del Oceano Pacifico.
					
					Muy inflados por el apoyo y la instigacion de su amo gringo, los titeres surcoreanos hablan tanto del castigo a la supuesta "provocacion" de la RPDC y traman sin vacilacion el plan de destruir atrevidamente los sagrados monumentos a la eternidad y veneracion a los lideres, simbolos de la maxima dignidad de la RPDC.
					
					La situacion grave creada comprueba que EE.UU., que traslado el centro estrategico para hegemonia mundial hacia la region de Asia-Pacifico, acarrea el nubarron de guerra nuclear tomando la RPDC como primer blanco de ataque.
					
					Ahora la guerra nuclear en la Peninsula Coreana reviste el significado no imaginario sino real.
					
					EE.UU. se vanagloria de su superioridad numerica de armas nucleares, pero no evitara el destino tragico de la polilla.
					
					La RPDC cuenta con los fuertes medios de ataque nuclear de alta precision y los metodos de guerra nuclear a estilo coreano.
					
					Los titeres surcoreanos, que actuan sin juicio confiando en los paraguas de su amo, probaran la consecuencia del ataque nuclear si estalla la guerra RPDC-EE.UU.
					
					Frente a la situacion critica, la Comandancia Suprema del EPC tomo la decision final de mostrar la voluntad de contramedida rotunda del ejercito y pueblo de la RPDC con las acciones militares reales y dio a las fuerzas armadas de ataque de justicia la orden de entrar en el estado de guardia de combate no.1.
					
					Por encargo, el MINREX de la RPDC avisa oficialmente al CS de la ONU que debido a las maniobras de provocacion de guerra nuclear de EE.UU. y los titeres surcoreanos se ha creado en la Peninsula Coreana la inminente situacion de guerra nuclear.
					
					El ejercito y el pueblo de la RPDC, unidos compactamente en torno a la Comandancia Suprema, explotaran todo el poderio del Songun acumulado tanto y entran en la etapa final de la gran batalla decisiva antiyanqui para defender la soberania del pais y la dignidad de la nacion.

articles.title: Premier coreano recorre unidades de defensa de islas Jangjae y Mu
articles.content:
Premier coreano recorre unidades de defensa de islas Jangjae y Mu
Pyongyang, 27 de marzo (ACNC) -- El premier de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Choe Yong Rim, hizo recorrido por la unidad de defensa de la isla Jangjae y la otra heroina de la isla Mu.
					Recorriendolas, Choe senalo que no tememos a cualesquier enemigos porque el Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Comandante Supremo del EPC, dirige en la delantera la revolucion y puntualizo que hay que arrasar despiadadamente los nidos de los males si los enemigos siguen recurriendo a la imprudente campana de guerra.
					
					La soberania de la nacion es mas preciosa que la vida y por eso todo el ejercito y el pueblo de la RPDC se han movilizado como un solo hombre en el enfrentamiento con los imperialistas yanquis, acoto y destaco la necesidad de defender a costa de la vida con las armas al Comandante Supremo.
					
					Pasando revista al cuartel, el bano y otros lugares, Choe averiguo los problemas necesarios a la vida material y cultural de los uniformados y otros asuntos que se presentan para acondicionar las unidades como la fortaleza inexpugnable y tomo las medidas correspondientes.

articles.title: CRPP denuncia actual gobernante surcoreana
articles.content:
CRPP denuncia actual gobernante surcoreana
Pyongyang, 27 de marzo (ACNC) -- A la pregunta formulada por la ACNC con respecto a que la actual autoridad surcoreana acuso a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, el portavoz del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria dio el dia 27 la siguiente respuesta:
					En estos tiempos en que se torna mas siniestra la campana conflictiva anti-RPDC en el Sur de Corea con motivo del 3o aniversario del incidente de hundimiento de la corbeta surcoreana "Cheonan", la duena de Chongwadae "hizo uso de la palabra" en la "ceremonia de recordacion" realizada el dia 26 en el Monumento Memorial de Taejon.
					
					En esta ocasion, la gobernante dijo que "las armas nucleares no pueden defender el sistema norcoreano" y que "la RPDC debe renunciar las armas nucleares" hablando del "cambio" y "cese de provocacion". 
					
					Y calumnio arrogantemente hasta el regimen de la RPDC con las palabras como "hambre", "aislamiento de suicidio" y "opcion por la paz y prosperidad". 
					
					Esto es una grave provocacion y desafio insolente e intolerable a la RPDC. 
					
					El incidente del hundimiento de "Cheonan" fue un complot nunca visto, inventado por la banda del traidor Lee Myung Bak, que se entrego con frenesi a la campana fratricida y las maniobras belicas anti-RPDC, y causo gran repudio en el interior y exterior del pais. 
					
					En este mundo no existen los inmorales como la banda titere surcoreana que impuso la muerte tragica a los inocentes soldados y lo abusaron para la confrontacion fratricida. 
					
					Lo problematico es que la duena de Chongwadae arma la campana de confrontacion so pretexto de tal intriga y hablo de que "no se puede vivir con armas nucleares", como lo hizo su antecedente, haciendo recordar su insistencia en la "discriminacion" y el "cambio de la politica sobre el Norte".
					
					Esto prueba que el "poder" actual surcoreano es el conflictivo igual al "poder" de Lee Myung Bak.
					
					?Acaso el arma nuclear del Norte de Corea o la de EE.UU. amenaza la seguridad y la paz?, ?Quien recurre freneticamente a la provocacion y quien debe cambiar?
					
					La duena de Chongwadae debe saberlo claramente y moderarse en las palabras. 
					
					Ya en el discurso pronunciado en la "toma de posesion" y el "acto por el Primero de Marzo", ella solto sin vacilacion alguna las palabras provocativas.
					
					El "proceso de confianza" y el "dialogo", de que habla ella recurriendo a la confrontacion fratricida, no pasa de ser una hipocresia y engano a si misma.
					
					Ya hemos advertido severamente a ella por sus palabras virulentas. 
					
					Volvemos a advertir que nuestra paciencia y autocontrol llegan al limite ante la locura conflictiva cada dia mas recrudescente.
					
					En la Peninsula Coreana las relaciones de ambas partes coreanas estan en una fase irrecuperable y se crea una situacion tan tirante. En ese momento, ella debe actuar con prudencia dandose clara cuenta de que una palabra erronea pueda causar una temible catastrofe.
					
					Si ella sigue recurriendo a la confrontacion al igual que el traidor Lee Myung Bak, sin prestar oidos a nuestra advertencia, sufrira el arruinamiento tragico.

articles.title: Servicio de Inteligencia del Sur de Corea es nido de complots anti-RPDC, comenta ACNC
articles.content:
Servicio de Inteligencia del Sur de Corea es nido de complots anti-RPDC, comenta ACNC
Pyongyang, 27 de marzo (ACNC) -- Se ha revelado otra vez la naturaleza conflictiva del Servicio de Inteligencia del Sur de Corea.
					Segun un dato, en las elecciones "presidenciales" del ano pasado, el Servicio de Inteligencia titere realizo una inspeccion politica a las fuerzas progresistas calificandolas de "izquierdistas pro-Norte" y les ejercio la presion de todas maneras. 
					
					Los cabecillos del Servicio de Inteligencia libraron directamente la campana electoral a favor de la candidata del "Partido Saenuri" y reprimieron las entidades y personalidades que rechazaron y censuraron la obra de arreglo de cuatro rios, la concertacion del "Tratado de Libre Comercio", etc. tildandolas de "fuerzas pro-Norte". 
					
					Esto no pasa de ser una parte de la campana de confrontacion fratricida del Servicio de Inteligencia que se entrega solo a las intrigas anti-RPDC.
					
					El Servicio de Inteligencia es el bastion de la dominacion de dictadura fascista y el  nido de los complots anti-RPDC, debido a lo cual se vieron exterminados los derechos democraticos, la libertad y los derechos humanos de la poblacion surcoreana y reprimidas las personalidades y entidades pro-reunificacion. 
					
					Maltratan y reprime bestialmente a los habitantes y las fuerzas progresistas que luchan contra la dominacion fascista proyanqui y las maniobras conflictivas anti-reunificacion. 
					
					Los gangsteres de citada entidad recurren a la campana de DDHH anti-RPDC, al lanzamiento de volantes de contenido anti-RPDC y al secuestro de habitantes norcoreanos e inventaron el incidente para "destruir las estatuas de bronce" de los Grandes Hombres del monte Paektu.
					
					Hoy dia, el Servicio de Inteligencia es el nido de la fabricacion de los casos de espias y las maniobras de destruccion y de sabotaje anti-RPDC. Se ha rehabilitado como un aparato de intrigas fascistas ilimitadas como Agencia Central de Inteligencia. 
					
					En estos tiempos se torna mas siniestra la locura conflictiva de dicho Servicio.
					
					En contubernio con los conservadores ultraderechistas incluso el "Partido Saenuri", crean el ambiente de represion contra las fuerzas progresistas como el Partido Progresista Unido que rechazan la "sancion" anti-RPDC y los ejercicios de guerra contra la RPDC. 
					
					El 28 de febrero pasado, desarrollo un acto en Seul y cuestiono a varias personalidades de partidos opositores, novelistas y activistas sociales como "elementos pro-Norte". 
					
					Presento al representante de "Big News" como conferenciante quien acuso de "elementos pro-Norte" al representante del Partido Progresista Unido, diputados y novelistas pertenecientes al mismo partido y otros, y hasta al alcalde de Seul y la Voz de la Poblacion. 
					
					Lo mas grave del caso es que no solo el Partido Progresista Unido sino tambien todas las fuerzas progresistas se hacen objeto de la  represion de la banda conservadora librada bajo el rotulo de eliminar a las "fuerzas subordinadas al Norte".
					
					Los titeres surcoreanos tildan de "fuerzas pro-Norte" a la Solidaridad por el Progreso, la Solidaridad de Estudiantes Surcoreanos del Siglo 21 y otras entidades vinculandolas con la RPDC. 
					
					Los hechos demuestran que la campana de "eliminacion de las fuerzas pro-Norte", armada por los conservadores surcoreanos, es una maniobra premeditada para exterminar a las fuerzas progresistas y una expresion de la hostilidad extremada a los connacionales y de la conciencia fratricida. 
					
					Debe ser eliminada de inmediato el Servicio de Inteligencia del Sur de Corea, bastion de confrontacion fratricida.
